parameter 1: There are two VHS Russian language versions, one running only 74 minutes.
parameter 2: The UK Warner video was cut by 1 min 53 secs with edits to a scene where a man caresses Maya and slashes her clothes with a knife.
parameter 3: The UK Warner video was cut by 1 min 53 secs with edits to a scene where a man caresses Maya and slashes her clothes with a knife.
parameter 4: The Japanese video/DVD release is uncut by all lower frontal nudity is fuzzed out.
parameter 5: Although rated not under 18 German Video-Release was cut for violence. The cuts are: - a Terrorist burns longer and then falls down the wall - Michael Dudikoff and the others walking besides him - A hostage breaking a Terrorists neck - Micheal Dudikoff killing the Bad Guy with the billiard coe
parameter 6: The 1986 and 1990 UK video versions were cut by 1 min 38 secs by the BBFC to remove the rape before the fight on the roof and to heavily edit fight scenes including groin kicks, face slaps and a woman's head being hit against a window. Some fight cuts were restored in the 1998 MIA video release though most of the original BBFC edits were retained. The 2006 Anchor Bay DVD had been heavily pre-edited and was missing the BBFC cuts along with some other edits.
parameter 7: There are two VHS Russian language versions, one running only 74 minutes.
parameter 8: The 1986 and 1990 UK video versions were cut by 1 min 38 secs by the BBFC to remove the rape before the fight on the roof and to heavily edit fight scenes including groin kicks, face slaps and a woman's head being hit against a window. Some fight cuts were restored in the 1998 MIA video release though most of the original BBFC edits were retained. The 2006 Anchor Bay DVD had been heavily pre-edited and was missing the BBFC cuts along with some other edits.
parameter 9: The U.S. version was distributed in two formats in 1960: as a full length feature film, and in a serialized form designed for daily television airings. The serial version ran in segments approximately 5 minutes long.
parameter 10: The 1986 and 1990 UK video versions were cut by 1 min 38 secs by the BBFC to remove the rape before the fight on the roof and to heavily edit fight scenes including groin kicks, face slaps and a woman's head being hit against a window. Some fight cuts were restored in the 1998 MIA video release though most of the original BBFC edits were retained. The 2006 Anchor Bay DVD had been heavily pre-edited and was missing the BBFC cuts along with some other edits.
parameter 11: For the Spanish version the nude scenes were re-shot with the women completely dressed.
parameter 12: The Something Weird Video print only displays four cast credits before ending abruptly. The Alpha Blue Archives print displays the names of sixteen cast members in the closing credits.

parameter 15: The U.S. version was distributed in two formats in 1960: as a full length feature film, and in a serialized form designed for daily television airings. The serial version ran in segments approximately 5 minutes long.
parameter 16: The U.S. version was distributed in two formats in 1960: as a full length feature film, and in a serialized form designed for daily television airings. The serial version ran in segments approximately 5 minutes long.
parameter 17: The American video is edited of all the explicit sexual content. Any scenes featuring the waist down in any sex scene has been cut. The jacuzzi sex scene and the sex scene that follows on from it has been entirely cut out. The final sex scene in the barn has been edited down, removing wide shots that see the senator in-between Billy's legs having sex, shots from the waist up are the only sexual content seen; to maintain the continuity of the music shots of the CCTV camera and the man watching the sex on the monitor are re-used. The uncut version was broadcast on British television, Channel 5, in the late 90's.
parameter 18: This film is a French/Italian co-production. This is the reason why there exists two versions. In general the French version runs ca. 9 minutes shorter in comparison to the Italian version. Many scenes are arranged in a different order. The French version features a scene not included in the Italian version where Dalla Chiesa talks with former colleagues.
parameter 19: The UK Warner video was cut by 1 min 53 secs with edits to a scene where a man caresses Maya and slashes her clothes with a knife.
parameter 20: This Czech film was updated by William Cayton a decade later with sequences involving American boys in New York who looked sufficiently like the Czech originals.
